sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Summit Park District Tax Levy Validation (2010) Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Summit Park District Tax Levy Validation (2010) Act.

sections.heading: Tax levy ordinances of the Summit Park District
sections.text: If the Summit Park District has, during the fiscal year 2010-2011, within the time required by law adopted an annual appropriation ordinance for that year and adopted its annual tax levy ordinance for the tax year 2010 and duly files the same with the

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
